displayName.text: Natural African Hair Braiding - Ask For Kwamie

formattedAddress: 2063 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Natural African Hair Braiding - Ask For Kwamie

adrFormatAddress: 2063 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
I came here to get faux locs done before my birthday vacation. The shop was very clean and I was greeted by the store owner, Kwamie, who has been doing hair for over 10+ years. She assured me that the style I wanted could be executed by one of her stylists and I was seated at a station quickly.

Marie started my hair and I was impressed by how clean her parting skills were. She took her time and made sure each part was symmetrical. Her crotchet technique was great and you can tell she knows exactly what she is doing. When I got home, I wasn‚Äôt completely satisfied with the final outcome. She did a great job, but I wanted to add more curls to the look.

I texted Kwamie that same night and asked if I could come back in the following day to touch up the style. She was very accommodating to my request. Kwamie added the extra curls I desired and I loved the final look! I get so many compliments on my hairstyle (especially on how clean the parting is).

I definitely recommend coming to this shop if you are looking to get your hair done. Kwamie offers an array of services and you will not be disappointed.

originalText.text: Service is incredible! Everyone is so sweet. Facilities are clean and they disinfect between hair items. Insane quality and a genuine commitment to healthy hair. I got braids done but still feel like my hair was well taken care of and nourished by her products. No nonsense!

text.text: Service is incredible! Everyone is so sweet. Facilities are clean and they disinfect between hair items. Insane quality and a genuine commitment to healthy hair. I got braids done but still feel like my hair was well taken care of and nourished by her products. No nonsense!

originalText.text: Ms. Kwame is such a nice lady and owner. I brought my mom with me to the appointment and she greeted us nicely. The employees are very nice and do an amazing job. What you ask for is what you get and more. Affordable and definitely would come back again!

originalText.text: This is a wonderful place with stylists who provide great hair services. I regularly go to Kwame B. who is my go to stylist. I can‚Äôt say enough about her attention to my preferences in how I want my hair done. Affordable too!
